<script>
var lang = navigator.language || navigator.userLanguage;

if (lang.startsWith('zh')) {
  window.location.href = "zh/index.html";
} else {
  window.location.href = "en/index.html";
}
</script>

Choose language:

- [中文](zh/index.html)
- [English](en/index.html)
